comment.author: 50872379@N05
comment._content: This is the wedding day photo of Christina Cullen, daughter of Frank and Sarah Cullen (nee Donaldson) Primrose Hill, Armagh to Patrick Hughes, son of  Patrick and Rose Ellen Hughes,( nee Fullen,) Loughgall. The couple were married in St Patrick's Cathedral, Armagh on 25th April 1945. Bestman(seated) was Frank McCusker, Loughgall, cousin of the bride and the bridesmaid was Emma O'Connor from Armagh, a friend of the bride. Groomsman was Billy Cullen, brother of the bride.

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Thanks for adding so much detail, Bobbie1925. It's great when more information comes to light about the photographs in this collection.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
